Reviews.Title: 9ghz wireless camera
Reviews.Author: jjt "buyalot"
Reviews.Content: Performs as advertised ... no interference with 2.4 ghz wifi great range good night vision considering.  Solves the problem of wifi interference with wireless cameras ! Amazed its not more popular because it truly is interference free and does the job its designed for very well ... would recomend and buy another if I had the need !

Reviews.Title: simple set-up
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: The item came quickly and was simple to install.  There was only problem that was not indicated in the item description:  this wireless transmission interferes with 900 mhz cordless phones.  There is NO interference with my wireless network or recently purchased DECT 6.0 cordless phones.

Reviews.Title: Loss of signal
Reviews.Author: TheGMan
Reviews.Content: I mounted camera on a pole 20' from house.  Initially I had the TV and receiver 25' inside the house.  The signal had to travel through a glass door and one interior wall.  Sometimes it worked sometimes it didn't.  I used a portable TV and tried different locations.  I moved the receiver to within 1' of the glass door.  It still lost signal more than it worked.This was the second camera.  I returned the first one because it had the same problem.  I thought maybe I had a defective camera.  The second one had exactly the same problem.  So, either the camera is very susceptible to interference or the range is far less than stated.  The camera was used in a rural residential house with no unusual interference sources.With the problems with the first camera, shipping times to and from the supplier my 30 days return had expired.I'm glad this item worked for some of you but I will never buy another Securityman product.

Reviews.Title: love the price and the quality.
Reviews.Author: Miss S
Reviews.Content: Had this system for a year now and it hasn't failed me. I'm able to surveillance my property with clear and accuracy day or night.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: The camera is advertised as having 100 foot indoor/300 foot outdoor range, and that just isn't true. I could barely get a picture 50 feet through the house  window outside due to tint in glass. The pine trees were pink not green,  I am returning this one - a complete waste of money and time.

Reviews.Title: No range, poor picture
Reviews.Author: Brendadog
Reviews.Content: Now I know you 'get what you pay for', but there's cheap, and then there's crap. The camera is advertised as having 100 foot indoor/300 foot outdoor range, and that just isn't true. I could barely get a picture 30 feet, and it couldn't transmit across the room if I stood between the camera and the receiver! And the picture, even for a camera of this size, is very poor. I am returning this one - a complete waste of money.

ProductInfo.Features:
510/492 pixels (Horizontal/Vertical)
Built-in IR LEDs for night vision upt to 23ft (B/W)
Weatherproof camera for outdoor use
No interference from crowded 2.4 GHz devices
Easy to setup and use
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman Wi-Fi Interference Free Wireless Outdoor/Indoor Bullet Color Camera Kit with Night Vision and Audio (CUcam1)
